Class AnimationHandler

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.game.AnimationHandler
public class AnimationHandler extends Object
Handles the game animation loop and coordinates game state transitions. This class manages the timing of game ticks and delegates state changes to the GameStateManager.

The AnimationHandler is responsible for:

  • Starting and stopping the game loop
  • Managing pause/resume functionality
  • Adjusting game speed through tick interval changes
  • Handling game over state transitions
See Also:
  • GameLoop
  • GameStateManager

  • Constructor Details

    • AnimationHandler

      public AnimationHandler(GameStateManager gameStateManager, javafx.util.Duration tickInterval, Runnable tickAction)
      Constructs a new AnimationHandler with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      gameStateManager - the manager responsible for game state transitions
      tickInterval - the initial interval between game ticks
      tickAction - the action to execute on each tick (typically moves the brick down)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

  • Method Details

    • ensureInitialized

      public void ensureInitialized()
      Ensures the game loop is initialized before starting. Creates a new GameLoop if one doesn't exist.

    • setTickInterval

      public void setTickInterval(javafx.util.Duration newInterval)
      Updates the tick interval for the game loop. This allows dynamic speed adjustments during gameplay.
      Parameters:
      newInterval - the new duration between game ticks

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game loop and transitions to the running state. Initializes the game loop if not already done.

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause()
      Toggles the pause state of the game. Has no effect if the game is over or the loop hasn't been initialized.

    • onGameOver

      public void onGameOver()
      Transitions the game to the game over state. Stops the game loop and prevents further gameplay.

    • isPaused

      public boolean isPaused()
      Checks if the game is currently paused.
      Returns:
      true if the game is paused, false otherwise

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise
